Package cams.dashboards.organiser_controllers

Interface OrganiserController

All Known Implementing Classes:
StaffOrganiserController
public interface OrganiserController
Interface defining the responsibilities of an organiser. Includes methods for creating, editing, and deleting camps, as well as managing camp assignments.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void assignCamp​(java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String campName)
    Assigns a user to a camp.
    void createCamp​(CampDetails details)
    Creates a new camp with the specified details.
    void deleteCamp​(java.lang.String campName)
    Deletes a camp based on its name.
    void editCamp​(java.lang.String campName, CampDetails details)
    Edits an existing camp with new details.
    CampDetails getCampDetails​(java.lang.String campName)
    Retrieves the details of a specific camp.
    int getNumAttendees​(java.lang.String campName)
    Gets the number of attendees registered for a specific camp.
    boolean isCampNameUnique​(java.lang.String campName)
    Checks if a camp name is unique within the system.
    int viewAllCamps​(User user, java.lang.String attribute, boolean ascending)
    Displays all camps created by the user

  • Method Details

    • createCamp

      void createCamp​(CampDetails details)
      Creates a new camp with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      details - The CampDetails object containing information about the new camp.

    • editCamp

      void editCamp​(java.lang.String campName, CampDetails details)
      Edits an existing camp with new details.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to be edited.
      details - The new CampDetails to be applied to the camp.

    • deleteCamp

      void deleteCamp​(java.lang.String campName)
      Deletes a camp based on its name.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to be deleted.

    • assignCamp

      void assignCamp​(java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String campName)
      Assigns a user to a camp.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID of the user to be assigned to the camp.
      campName - The name of the camp to which the user is being assigned.

    • isCampNameUnique

      boolean isCampNameUnique​(java.lang.String campName)
      Checks if a camp name is unique within the system.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to check.
      Returns:
      true if the camp name is unique, false otherwise.

    • getCampDetails

      CampDetails getCampDetails​(java.lang.String campName)
      Retrieves the details of a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp whose details are being requested.
      Returns:
      The CampDetails of the specified camp.

    • getNumAttendees

      int getNumAttendees​(java.lang.String campName)
      Gets the number of attendees registered for a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp.
      Returns:
      The number of attendees registered for the camp.

    • viewAllCamps

      int viewAllCamps​(User user, java.lang.String attribute, boolean ascending)
      Displays all camps created by the user
      Parameters:
      user - The current user
      Returns:
      Number of camps created.
